Summary: Friend and I were outside, friend said "what the hell is that", I looked up, saw a light that seemed to be moving slighly to the left and then too the right , sort of in a large cirlcle from pretty high up,I left shortly, when i returned, if slowely faded
divs: Sighting Detailsit was Oct 10,2012, i was outside my garage when a friend said look up, approx. about a mile up in the air, I saw a bright round object that seemed to move in a slow circular pattern, I ran inside the Garage to turn off my stereo and when I returned , It seemed to move easterly, then it faded out or the light dimmed..It really was no big sighting, i have seen some really bad ass stuff a long time ago but this time really nothing special , just felt like i needed to report it.But my friend was a little unnerved by it.that's all.

There were no other sightings in Redding on or around October 11th 2012
